options.name: Distance Shooter
options.description: Gain [Heavy +8 / Light +4 / Ultra Light +2] Unit Maximum Range

options.name: Action : Snipe
options.description: While you are Hidden from a Target, make an Attack with a Ranged Weapon. If the Attack hits, make a Contested Stealth Check against an Initiative Check of the Target. On a success, the Ranged Weapon Dice are doubled. On a success of 10 or more, the Ranged Weapon Dice are tripled.

options.name: Action : Trick Shot
options.description: You use 2 Ammunition and shoot them at different Targets that are within 4 Units of each other. Both Projectiles avoid any Partial Cover.

options.name: Veiled Shot
options.description: Gain +1 Stealth and +1 Damage to Ranged Weapons

options.name: Lying in Wait
options.description: Gain +2 Attack with and an extra 1d6 Damage with Ranged Weapons while Prone

options.name: Longshot
options.description: Gain +1 Damage to Ranged Weapons and Additional [Heavy +5 / Light +3 / Ultra Light +1] Range
